attributes.action: Make cats the ruling class of all the animal Kingdom in Great Britian and N.Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to their superior intelligence and personality and also their cute little babies, all cats should be made the ruling class, one step above the whole animal kingdom, and also 2 steps above Pikeys.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
